Disney animated adventure, with the voices of Tate Donovan, Danny DeVito, James Woods and Rip Torn.(n)

programme.title: The Krays
programme.desc: Biopic of the infamous twin brothers who built up a criminal empire in the East End of London during the 1960s. Seizing territory from an already established rival by force, they quickly rose to prominence in the city's gangland culture. However, over time the brothers began to clash, while enemies stood ready to bring them down. Starring Gary and Martin Kemp, Billie Whitelaw and Tom Bell.

programme.title: Taken
programme.desc: An American teenager travelling through Europe is abducted by a gang of sex traffickers. However, what the kidnappers do not realise is that the girl's father is a former CIA agent, who employs all his old skills as he searches for the criminals and tries to rescue his daughter. Thriller, starring Liam Neeson, Famke Janssen and Maggie Grace.

programme.title: Deep Family Secrets
programme.desc: A girl sets out on a personal quest to discover the truth about her mother's alleged abduction, and uncovers a tangled tale of adultery, incest and murder. Thriller, starring Richard Crenna, Angie Dickinson and Meg Foster.

programme.title: The International
programme.desc: An Interpol agent and a district attorney discover a major international bank is involved in a vast range of illegal activities, from insider trading to arms deals and bringing down governments. As they battle to expose the truth, they find the corrupt organisation not only has the law on its side, but will kill to keep the secrets safe. Thriller, starring Clive Owen and Naomi Watts.

programme.title: Southern Fury
programme.desc: When his brother falls foul of a ruthless mobster, a straight-laced man calls on his old friend and cop to help out. Crime thriller, starring Adrian Grenier, John Cusack and Nicolas Cage.

programme.title: United 93
programme.desc: Fact-based drama, recreating the events on the fourth plane hijacked in the September 11 attacks in 2001. The passengers were by now aware of the destruction at the World Trade Centre and the Pentagon. Realising their plane was about to be used for a similar purpose, they set out to wrest control from the terrorists. Directed by Paul Greengrass and starring Christian Clemenson, Trish Gates, David Alan Basche and Cheyenne Jackson.

programme.title: Contraband
programme.desc: Successful international smuggler Chris Farraday turns his back on a life of crime to raise a family. However, his brother-in-law crosses a powerful drug lord, who forces Chris to transport billions of dollars of counterfeit money into the US, or his wife and children will be killed. Crime thriller, starring Mark Wahlberg, Kate Beckinsale, Giovanni Ribisi and Ben Foster.

programme.title: The Machinist
programme.desc: A factory worker suffering from chronic insomnia has not slept properly in more than a year. When his extreme fatigue results in a tragic accident, his colleagues turn on him and he sinks into a state of intense paranoia, becoming obsessed with a man nobody else believes exists. Psychological thriller, starring Christian Bale, Jennifer Jason Leigh and Michael Ironside.

programme.title: Dick Tracy
programme.desc: An incorruptible Chicago cop launches a relentless campaign to stop a ruthless gangster plotting to take control of the city. But the detective finds himself distracted by the attentions of a seductive nightclub singer and a faceless vigilante playing both sides against the middle. Comic-strip adventure, directed by and starring Warren Beatty, with Madonna, Al Pacino and Dustin Hoffman.

programme.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin
programme.desc: An inner-city drug dealer puts his life of crime behind him after a near-fatal shooting to pursue a new career as a rap artist. Unfortunately, when he performs songs inspired by his shady past, his former criminal associates do not take kindly to having their misdeeds immortalised in music. Drama, starring Curtis `50 Cent' Jackson, Terrence Howard and Ashley Walters.

programme.title: Blood Father
programme.desc: An ex-con battles to protect his estranged daughter from the cronies of her cartel member ex. Action thriller, starring Mel Gibson, Erin Moriarty and Diego Luna.

programme.title: Contraband
programme.desc: Successful international smuggler Chris Farraday turns his back on a life of crime to raise a family. However, his brother-in-law crosses a powerful drug lord, who forces Chris to transport billions of dollars of counterfeit money into the US, or his wife and children will be killed. Crime thriller, starring Mark Wahlberg, Kate Beckinsale, Giovanni Ribisi and Ben Foster.

programme.title: The Juror
programme.desc: A mobster threatens to have a juror's son murdered if she fails to persuade the other 11 members of the jury to return a verdict of not guilty in the trial of a Mafia kingpin. Psychological thriller, starring Demi Moore, Alec Baldwin, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, James Gandolfini and Anne Heche.

programme.title: Road House
programme.desc: A philosophy-reading kung fu expert gains a reputation as the best bouncer around, and is hired by the owner of a rowdy Missouri bar to keep the peace. When he fires some of the establishment's corrupt staff, he incurs the wrath of a local crime boss who has a stranglehold on the town's businesses. Action thriller, starring Patrick Swayze, Ben Gazzara, Kelly Lynch, Sam Elliott and blues singer Jeff Healey.

programme.title: Dog Eat Dog
programme.desc: A crew of former prisoners are hired by a Cleveland crime syndicate to kidnap the baby of a rival mobster. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Willem Dafoe and Christopher Matthew Cook.

programme.title: Angel Flight Down
programme.desc: A mercy mission runs into difficulty when the plane commissioned to airlift a sick girl suffers engine trouble and crashes on the edge of a cliff. Drama, starring Patricia Kalember and David Charvet.

programme.title: Come And Find Me
programme.desc: A man's desperate search for his missing girlfriend takes him down an increasingly dark and dangerous path. Mystery thriller, starring Aaron Paul, Annabelle Wallis and Garret Dillahunt.

programme.title: The Bone Collector
programme.desc: A quadriplegic ex-cop is saved from the brink of suicide by a rookie female officer needing his expertise to form a psychological profile of a serial killer. The murderer is posing as a cab driver and terrorising Manhattan, and has a gruesome habit of taking trophies from his victims' bodies. Thriller, starring Denzel Washington, Angelina Jolie, Michael Rooker, Mike McGlone, Luis Guzman and Queen Latifah.

programme.title: What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: A doctor's wife recovering from a car accident is troubled by terrifying visions of a ghostly girl who seems to be asking for help from beyond the grave. While her husband thinks the experiences are the result of her recent trauma, a psychiatrist urges her to communicate with the spirit. Supernatural thriller, starring Michelle Pfeiffer, Harrison Ford, Diana Scarwid and Joe Morton.

programme.title: Two Down
programme.desc: A web of deceit unfolds and an unlikely alliance is formed when a young woman and a local delivery boy are taken hostage by an injured hitman. Comedy thriller, starring Conleth Hill, Alex Hassell and Tori Butler Hart.

programme.title: Red Dragon
programme.desc: The FBI agent who first captured Hannibal Lecter is called out of retirement to catch a demented murderer dubbed the Tooth Fairy, who slaughters a family whenever there is a full moon - forcing the detective to draw on the imprisoned cannibal's expertise in criminal psychology. Thriller prequel adapted from the first of Thomas Harris's Lecter novels, starring Anthony Hopkins, Edward Norton, Ralph Fiennes and Philip Seymour Hoffman.

programme.title: Wall Street: Money Never Sleeps
programme.desc: Ruthless stockbroker Gordon Gekko is released from prison after eight years, reinventing himself as an author and lecturer warning against the dangers of the financial system. Gekko helps a young banker get revenge on the company that drove his mentor to suicide, but as always, has a crooked agenda of his own. Oliver Stone's sequel to his 1980s drama, with Michael Douglas, Shia LaBeouf and Carey Mulligan.

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: Smuggler Danny Archer ends up in prison in war-torn Sierra Leone in 1999, where he meets Solomon, a Mende fisherman separated from his family by guerrillas. Danny pledges to help the desperate man rescue his son, who has been forcibly conscripted as a child soldier, in return for a rare pink diamond that Solomon had hidden away before his capture. Action thriller, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Djimon Hounsou and Jennifer Connelly.

programme.title: Brawl In Cell Block 99
programme.desc: A former boxer is blackmailed into performing a prison hit by a ruthless drug kingpin. Crime thriller, starring Vince Vaughn, Jennifer Carpenter and Don Johnson.

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Former government operative Jason Bourne is drawn out of hiding to uncover more truths about his father, while CIA director Robert Dewey orders his head of cyber-security to hunt him down. Action thriller, starring Matt Damon, Tommy Lee Jones, Alicia Vikander and Julia Stiles.

programme.title: K-Shop
programme.desc: A Bournemouth takeaway owner despairs of his drunken, abusive customers and is finally pushed to the limit when his father is killed in a violent altercation. He begins murdering the people who make his life a misery, and disposes of the bodies by making them into kebabs. Horror, starring Reece Noi and Ewen MacIntosh.(n)

programme.title: Wild Things
programme.desc: A high-school counsellor is accused of rape by a student whose advances he spurned - and unfortunately for him, one of her peers backs up her story. Thriller, starring Neve Campbell, Denise Richards, Matt Dillon, Kevin Bacon, Theresa Russell, Robert Wagner and Bill Murray.(n)

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner.(n)

programme.title: Alleycats
programme.desc: A bicycle courier believes he has witnessed a murder, and flees for his life. However, he resolves later to uncover the truth of what he saw and investigates further, leading him into a dangerous world of political corruption and illegal bike racing. Action thriller, starring Josh Whitehouse, Eleanor Tomlinson and John Hannah.(n)

programme.title: Drone
programme.desc: A drone pilot who's spent his career conducting covert operations from the comfort of his own home is finally forced to confront his actions. Thriller, starring Sean Bean, Patrick Sabongui and Mary McCormack.(n)

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham 123
programme.desc: Criminals hijack a crowded New York subway train and threaten to start shooting the passengers unless a $10million ransom is paid in one hour. However, the transport supervisor they issue their demands to begins to suspect the plot is part of an even grander scheme. Tony Scott's thriller remake, with Denzel Washington and John Travolta.(n)

programme.title: Nocturnal Animals
programme.desc: An art gallery owner is tormented by the violent thriller penned by ex-husband. Tom Ford's psychological thriller, starring Amy Adams, Jake Gyllenhaal and Michael Shannon.(n)

programme.title: Don't Breathe
programme.desc: A trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who is not as helpless as he seems, and their hopes of walking away with a massive fortune do not go to plan. Horror, starring Stephen Lang, Jane Levy and Dylan Minnette.(n)

programme.title: Live by Night
programme.desc: A group of Boston-bred gangsters set up shop in balmy Florida during the Prohibition era, facing off against the competition and the Ku Klux Klan. Crime drama, directed by and starring Ben Affleck, with Elle Fanning, Remo Girone and Brendan Gleeson.(n)

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham 123
programme.desc: Criminals hijack a crowded New York subway train and threaten to start shooting the passengers unless a $10million ransom is paid in one hour. However, the transport supervisor they issue their demands to begins to suspect the plot is part of an even grander scheme. Tony Scott's thriller remake, with Denzel Washington and John Travolta.(n)

programme.title: Rising Sun
programme.desc: A cop investigating the murder of a prostitute in the Los Angeles offices of a Japanese corporation joins forces with a mysterious detective who is an expert on Asian culture. They discover security footage of the killer has been digitally altered, pointing to a secret conspiracy within the company. Thriller, adapted from the novel by Michael Crichton, starring Sean Connery, Wesley Snipes, Harvey Keitel and Tia Carrere.(n)

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: A maverick detective vows to catch a racist criminal suspected of murdering an innocent black man. However, the only witness is reluctant to talk, and the killer comes from a very wealthy family, prompting the tough-talking cop to quit the force and bring in the culprit on his own terms. Remake of the blaxploitation thriller, starring Samuel L Jackson, Christian Bale and Toni Collette.(n)

programme.title: The Rum Diary
programme.desc: A New York journalist tires of America in the early 1960s, and relocates to Puerto Rico, where he works for a local paper and throws himself into the decadent local lifestyle. His obsession with a woman who has also arrived from the States leads to him getting mixed up in the corrupt dealings of her property tycoon fiance. Comedy drama based on Hunter S Thompson's novel, starring Johnny Depp, Aaron Eckhart, Amber Heard and Giovanni Ribisi. In English and Spanish.

programme.title: Down to the Sea in Ships
programme.desc: Sea captain Bering Joy takes his grandson Jed on a whaling trip to teach him about life's challenges and truths, while first mate Dan Lunceford's assignment to look after the lad has dramatic consequences on a voyage packed with incident and danger. Seafaring adventure, starring Lionel Barrymore, Richard Widmark, and Dean Stockwell.

programme.title: Operation Petticoat
programme.desc: A Second World War submarine captain tries to restore his crippled vessel to its former glory, but is thwarted by his first officer, who has invited a party of nurses, children and an expectant mother on board. Mayhem ensues as the skipper struggles to rein in the female influence on ship protocol. Comedy, starring Cary Grant, Tony Curtis and Joan O'Brien.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: One-eyed, over-the-hill US Marshal Rooster Cogburn reluctantly agrees to help a girl track down her father's killer. The quest is complicated by a Texas Ranger, who is also on the murderer's trail, and a host of villains who have few qualms about disposing of the meddling youngster and her protector. Western, starring an Oscar-winning John Wayne alongside Jeff Corey, Kim Darby, Glen Campbell, Robert Duvall and Dennis Hopper.

programme.title: Beautiful Creatures
programme.desc: A teenager falls in love with a new girl in his school, only to discover she is a witch. As dark secrets from her family's past emerge, they discover that on her 16th birthday, she will be required to choose a side in a conflict between good and evil. Fantasy based on Kami Garcia's novel, starring Alden Ehrenreich, Alice Englert, Jeremy Irons and Emma Thompson.

programme.title: The Wolverine
programme.desc: The former member of the X-Men is lured out of hiding and travels to Japan, where a dying businessman offers him the chance to give up his immortality for a normal life. He ends up robbed of his superhuman powers by a mysterious scientist and is forced to protect the tycoon's granddaughter from a secret conspiracy's assassins. Superhero adventure spin-off, starring Hugh Jackman and Tao Okamoto.

programme.title: Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai
programme.desc: A hitman lives by a strict code of honour inspired by ancient Japanese traditions. When his latest assignment goes wrong, the gangster he works for decides to have him killed. As he fights to defend himself against an enemy he still views as his master, he is forced to question his beliefs and what will become of him if he abandons them. Thriller, with Forest Whitaker and John Tormey.

programme.title: House of Flying Daggers
programme.desc: Two imperial officers are sent to find the head of a rebel group, which threatens to destroy the Tang dynasty's tenuous grip on power. Their search leads the duo to a beautiful blind dancer, who they hope will take them to the mysterious and influential figure - but matters soon take an unexpected turn. Romantic period martial arts adventure from director Zhang Yimou, starring Zhang Ziyi, Takeshi Kaneshiro, Andy Lau and Song Dandan. In Mandarin.

programme.title: Last Train from Gun Hill
programme.desc: A marshal discovers the man responsible for raping and killing his wife is actually the son of an old friend, setting the scene for a showdown. Western, starring Kirk Douglas, Anthony Quinn, Brian Hutton and Carolyn Jones.

programme.title: Fixed Bayonets
programme.desc: An American army platoon on duty during the Korean war is left stranded in the mountains while covering their comrades' retreat. Among them is a timid corporal with no real experience of battle, who is soon forced into assuming command when all his superior officers are killed. Drama, starring Richard Basehart, Gene Evans and Michael O'Shea.

programme.title: The Savage
programme.desc: A white man raised by the Sioux after his family were killed by Crow warriors finds his loyalties tested in later life. Western, starring Charlton Heston, Susan Morrow and Peter Hansen.

programme.title: Funeral in Berlin
programme.desc: Former crook and disreputable spy Harry Palmer has to carefully engineer the defection of a Russian officer responsible for safeguarding vital military secrets - but the mission proves less than straightforward. Cold War thriller and the second film to feature Len Deighton's character, starring Michael Caine, Eva Renzi, Oscar Homolka, Paul Hubschmid and Guy Doleman.

programme.title: A Good Year
programme.desc: A city trader inherits a French vineyard from his deceased uncle. But when he goes to France to get a valuation on his newly acquired property so he can sell it, a series of unexpected events leads him to reassess his priorities in life. Ridley Scott's comedy drama based on Peter Mayle's novel, starring Russell Crowe, Albert Finney, Abbie Cornish and Marion Cotillard.

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: A woman survives a car crash, and wakes up to find herself in an underground bunker, belonging to a survivalist who claims that a devastating attack has left the outside world uninhabitable. As his behaviour becomes increasingly stranger, she begins to fear she is being tricked and resolves to discover the truth for herself. Thriller, starring Mary Elizabeth Winstead and John Goodman.

programme.title: 99 Homes
programme.desc: A single father desperately trying to support his son and his mother goes to work for the ruthless businessman who evicted them from their home. He is seduced by the glamorous world of high finance and seeks the chance to provide for his family's security - but to get it, he will have to deprive other families of their homes. Drama, starring Andrew Garfield, Michael Shannon and Laura Dern.

programme.title: The Idol
programme.desc: Premiere. Aspiring Gaza strip musician Mohammed hears that auditions for the pan-Arabic TV music talent contest Arab Idol will be held in Cairo, and decides to give it a shot. However, before even attempting to get on the show, first he must get out of Palestine and into Egypt. Fact-based comedy drama, starring Tawfeek Barhom. In Arabic.(n)

programme.title: The Fighting Kentuckian
programme.desc: French settlers are granted asylum in America in the aftermath of Napoleon's defeat at Waterloo and a Kentucky rifleman finds himself falling for one of the newcomers - a general's daughter. However, he faces a rival for her affections in the form of a ruthless landowner who plans to steal the terrritory her fellow exiles have settled on. George Waggner's Western, starring John Wayne, Vera Hruba Ralston, Philip Dorn and Oliver Hardy.(n)

programme.title: Fair Wind to Java
programme.desc: A sailor races to reach a hoard of diamonds stowed on board a Dutch vessel that has sunk in the East Indies. However, the derelict ship lies close to an island inhabited by a fierce tribe with a deep mistrust of strangers, while a volcano is about to erupt at any moment. Seafaring adventure, with Fred MacMurray, Vera Ralston and Robert Douglas.(n)

programme.title: The War Wagon
programme.desc: A convict is released from prison and swears vengeance on the corrupt mining contractor who took his gold-rich land. On the way, he encounters an old enemy who reveals that the gold from the mine is about to be transported in an armoured stagecoach - and suggests they join forces to steal it. Western, starring John Wayne, Kirk Douglas, Bruce Cabot and Howard Keel.(n)

programme.title: Billion Dollar Brain
programme.desc: Former secret agent Harry Palmer comes out of retirement to take a mysterious canister to Finland, and ends up embroiled in an American megalomaniac's bid to take over the world. Espionage thriller, directed by Ken Russell and starring Michael Caine, Oscar Homolka and Karl Malden.(n)

programme.title: Top Secret
programme.desc: A rock 'n' roll singer goes on tour in East Germany in the 1950s, where a scientist's daughter draws him into the world of international espionage through a French underground movement seeking to foil a Nazi plan to take over the world. Comedy, spoofing Second World War spy thrillers and Elvis movies, starring Val Kilmer, Lucy Gutteridge and Omar Sharif.(n)

programme.title: Dracula Untold
programme.desc: A Romanian knight fights to defend his homeland against Turkish invaders. Faced with overwhelming odds, he enters into a dangerous bargain to gain supernatural powers so he can drive off his enemies - but the deal could cost him his humanity as he transforms into a terrifying monster. Fantasy adventure, starring Luke Evans, Dominic Cooper and Charles Dance.(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 1
programme.desc: Peaceful vampire Edward marries his human girlfriend Bella, who soon falls pregnant. However, the existence of this child has dangerous implications for them and the people around them, and a pack of werewolves is determined to prevent the birth by any means necessary. The first half of the two-part conclusion to the romantic fantasy series, with Kristen Stewart and Robert Pattinson.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Olivia seeks help from the Pickett defence plant for a day nursery for the children of the defence workers, but encounters much difficulty. When Corabeth discovers a perfumed handkerchief in her husband's pocket, she suspects the worst of Ike ruining their anniversary celebrations.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Caleb Hodgekiss comes up with a way to scam the residents of Walnut Grove after rescuing a seriously ill Rev Alden from his runaway wagon. Johnny Cash guest stars.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Nellie Oleson is seriously injured after falling from a horse that used to belong to Laura Ingalls, and her mother blames the steed's former owner for the accident.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd becomes concerned for the long-term welfare of an elderly woman who stubbornly refuses to have a growth removed from her throat because she's afraid it might prevent her from singing in her church choir at a Christmas concert. Mike Farrell stars.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd is forced to recall a repressed childhood memory of her late mother Lynda as she nurses a dying patient, and Joanie is jailed after impersonating her sister at a pharmaceuticals convention.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan helps a minister cope with a crisis of conscience when his church insists on religion being taught in pre-school classes - to the outrage of parents.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Mark is reunited with old friends at his high-school reunion, but they all find themselves forced to admit they are not as young as they used to be.

programme.title: Making Mr Right
programme.desc: A glamorous magazine editor makes a bet with her best friend that she can turn a scruffy conman into the perfect gentleman, who will win the title of her publication's bachelor of the year. But, as she sets about teaching the layabout some manners, she unexpectedly ends up falling for him and his laidback approach to life. Romantic comedy, starring Christina Cox, Dean Cain and Jocelyne Loewen.

programme.title: Sleeping with the Devil
programme.desc: A woman's life is turned upside down by the discovery that her seemingly perfect boyfriend is psychotically unbalanced and, as his mania increases, he pays a killer to gun her down. Drama, starring Shannen Doherty, Tim Matheson, Bonnie Bartlett and Steve Eastin.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy reads Adolf Hitler's book Mein Kampf, and causes uproar when he plans to publish excerpts in the newspaper so the townsfolk will be aware of what is happening in the world.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The church needs a new bell, creating tension between the Kennedys and the Olesons.

programme.title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Heartbroken Bride
programme.desc: The attorney is invited to the wedding of his niece, a famous popstar. During the wedding ceremony things are disrupted by the bride's uncle threatening her father. Security overpower him and take him into a side room, but later he is found dead - with the bride standing over him. Is she guilty or is she being framed? Mystery, starring Raymond Burr, Linda Blair, Ronny Cox, Barbara Hale and William R Moses.

programme.title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Lethal Lesson
programme.desc: The crusading attorney represents a law student wrongly accused of murder, hindered every step of the way by the defendant's wealthy girlfriend. Mystery, starring Raymond Burr, Barbara Hale, William R Moses and Alexandra Paul.

programme.title: Gettysburg
programme.desc: Fact-based drama recreating the battle of the American Civil War, where Union and Confederate forces fought for three days in Pennsylvania, a confrontation that would change the course of the war. Starring Tom Berenger, Martin Sheen, Jeff Daniels and Stephen Lang.

programme.title: Born Free
programme.desc: Oscar-winning fact-based drama chronicling the lives of game wardens Joy and George Adamson, who adopted an orphaned lion cub in Kenya and trained the animal to survive in the wild so that one day it might return to its natural habitat. Starring Virginia McKenna, Bill Travers and Geoffrey Keen.

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark: All Around the Town
programme.desc: A troubled student finds herself under suspicion when one of her tutors is killed and police become convinced a violent incident from her past has manifested itself in murderous fashion. Thriller, adapted from a novel by Mary Higgins Clark, starring Nastassja Kinski, Kim Schraner and Andrea Roth.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Olivia seeks help from the Pickett defence plant for a day nursery for the children of the defence workers, but encounters much difficulty. When Corabeth discovers a perfumed handkerchief in her husband's pocket, she suspects the worst of Ike ruining their anniversary celebrations.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A film crew shoot a documentary at the plant, and the director tells Erin he can make her a star.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura and her horse Bunny are favoured to win the upcoming race in Walnut Grove - however, Mrs Oleson believes the victory should go to Nellie. To guarantee her success she purchases a thoroughbred and provides the trophy.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: While collecting insects for a school project, Laura and Mary become annoyed at Carrie as she lets the bugs escape, but worry when the youngster wanders off and goes missing.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd attempts to help a paper boy who has been shot in suspicious circumstances. Drama, starring Melina Kanakaredes and Mike Farrell.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd tries to help a hideously disfigured man, while Joanie excitedly makes preparations for her wedding. Melina Kanakaredes and Mike Farrell star.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: A teenager accuses a bus driver involved in an accident of making advances toward her just before the crash - but her story does not add up.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan comes to the aid of an amputee who becomes an activist for the rights of disabled people after a false fire alarm endangers his life.

programme.title: Touching Wild Horses
programme.desc: A youngster is forced to go to live with his aunt on an isolated Canadian island following the death of his parents, and forms a bond with an orphaned wild pony - a relationship that helps him deal with his grief. Drama, starring Jane Seymour, Mark Rendall and James McGowan.

programme.title: Betrayed by Innocence
programme.desc: A married commercial film-maker is charged with statutory rape when it is revealed that his lover is only 16. Drama, starring Barry Bostwick and Cristen Kauffman.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A mysterious presence moving through the night strikes fear in the hearts of the Walton's Mountain residents, disrupting plans for a dance.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mary is forbidden from taking a scholarship exam after she accidentally sets fire to the barn, but Laura fears she will defy their mother.

programme.title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Killer Kiss
programme.desc: Suspects abound in the case of a TV soap star's murder, setting the redoubtable legal eagle on a crusade to separate fact from fiction. All the evidence seems to point in the direction of an old friend, and with a host of witnesses willing to testify against her, Perry has his work cut out. Mystery, featuring Raymond Burr in his last appearance as the ace attorney, with Barbara Hale, William R Moses and Stuart Damon.

programme.title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Maligned Mobster
programme.desc: A reformed hoodlum is charged with murdering his wife - but the crusading attorney steps in, hoping to prove his innocence. Crime drama, starring Raymond Burr, Michael Nader, Barbara Hale and William R Moses.

programme.title: Gettysburg
programme.desc: Fact-based drama recreating the battle of the American Civil War, where Union and Confederate forces fought for three days in Pennsylvania, a confrontation that would change the course of the war. Starring Tom Berenger, Martin Sheen, Jeff Daniels and Stephen Lang.

programme.title: Grace Kelly
programme.desc: Biopic of the Hollywood legend, beginning with her teenage years, examining her stormy relationship with her overbearing millionaire father, through to her success as a movie star and culminating in her marriage to Prince Rainier of Monaco, for whom she sacrificed her glittering career. Starring Cheryl Ladd, Lloyd Bridges, Diane Ladd and Alejandro Rey.

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark: Haven't We Met Before
programme.desc: A disturbed man causes concern when he claims he is responsible for a series of murders, and that he is the vengeance-hungry reincarnation of an executed 19th-century criminal. But his bizarre story soon begins to make horrifying sense, thrusting a dedicated cop into a race against the clock. Thriller, adapted from a novel by Mary Higgins Clark, starring Nicolette Sheridan, Page Fletcher and Anthony Lemke.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Olivia seeks help from the Pickett defence plant for a day nursery for the children of the defence workers, but encounters much difficulty. When Corabeth discovers a perfumed handkerchief in her husband's pocket, she suspects the worst of Ike ruining their anniversary celebrations.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A film crew shoot a documentary at the plant, and the director tells Erin he can make her a star.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mary and Laura hear a loud argument the night before Halloween, and become convinced they have witnessed the murder of Mrs Oleson. Drama, starring Melissa Sue Anderson and Melissa Gilbert.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: Journey in the Spring - Part One
programme.desc: Part one of two. Charles Ingalls receives the sad news that his mother has died, and must travel back to where he grew up to persuade his father to come and live with him in Walnut Grove.(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.sub-title: It Was a Dark and Stormy Night
programme.desc: Syd begins to understand the source of Graham's unspeakable pain after she is stranded in a storm with him. Elsewhere, Joanie and Burt make an impulsive decision which ends in disaster. Melina Kanakardes stars.(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Joanie withdraws from society as the full impact of the miscarriage takes hold, and Syd attempts to persuade a recluse to have plastic surgery when she discovers he is about to be evicted.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan helps the students of a high-school in their efforts to prevent a beloved teacher being forced into retirement.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark help a Vietnamese couple searching for their children whom they were forced to give up during the war.(n)

programme.title: The Engagement Ring
programme.desc: When a missing engagement ring turns up 40 years after it was lost, its appearance opens old wounds but also prompts a new romance to blossom. Romantic comedy, starring Patricia Heaton, Vincent Spano, Tony Lo Bianco and David Hunt.(n)

programme.title: This Child Is Mine
programme.desc: A couple adopt a baby girl, but the teenage mother fights a legal battle to regain custody of the child. Fact-based drama, starring Lindsay Wagner, Chris Sarandon and Nancy McKeon.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part one of two. Mary Ellen announces she is engaged to a fellow student Dr David Spencer and they start planning the wedding. However, her hasty marriage is threatened by her feelings for new town doctor Curtis Willard, and she begins to have second thoughts.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: The Lord Is My Shepherd - Part One
programme.desc: Part one of two. Jealous of Charles' attention for his new son, Laura longs for her father's affections and refuses to pray for her baby brother to get well when he falls ill.(n)

programme.title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Telltale Talk Show Host
programme.desc: An unpopular radio presenter is murdered and the finger points at a colleague - until Perry uncovers a host of famous suspects who had reason to do the dirty deed. Courtroom mystery, starring Raymond Burr, with TV personalities Montel Williams and Regis Philbin.(n)

programme.title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Jealous Jokester
programme.desc: Lawyer Bill McKenzie bends the rules to clear his niece of murdering a TV star who ruled her sitcom with an iron fist. Courtroom drama, starring Hal Holbrook, William R Moses, Barbara Hale and Tony Roberts, with an appearance by real-life sitcom star Tina Yothers.(n)

programme.title: Hercules
programme.desc: First of a two-part drama about the legendary son of Zeus. The Princess of Thebes falls pregnant by the chief of the gods. Once born, the child is made to feel an outcast as he is rejected by his mother, envied by brother Iphicles and the target of a revenge plot by Zeus's wife Hera. Forced into exile, Hercules agrees to a series of tasks to redeem himself. With Paul Telfer, Elizabeth Perkins, Timothy Dalton and Luke Ford.(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Husband
programme.desc: Fact-based thriller following the investigation into the disappearance of a pregnant woman. While her apparently devoted husband makes repeated appeals for her safe return, events take a shocking turn when a woman comes forward to reveal she is having an affair with him - and his public persona is just a facade. Starring Dean Cain, Sarah Brown and GW Bailey.(n)

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark: Loves Music, Loves to Dance
programme.desc: A tenacious TV producer sets out to get to the bottom of a friend's murder, certain that the killer was a man her pal had met online. However, it soon becomes clear that her very personal investigation has served only to place her in danger as well. Mystery, based on Mary Higgins Clark's novel, starring Patsy Kensit, Cynthia Preston and Dean McDermott.(n)

programme.title: Thelma & Louise
programme.desc: Two world-weary friends flee their dull dead end lives for a weekend road trip. However, when they kill a would-be rapist in self-defence, they make a fateful decision to run from the law, sparking a chain of events destined to end in tragedy. Ridley Scott's drama, starring Geena Davis, Susan Sarandon, Harvey Keitel, Michael Madsen and Brad Pitt.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Olivia seeks help from the Pickett defence plant for a day nursery for the children of the defence workers, but encounters much difficulty. When Corabeth discovers a perfumed handkerchief in her husband's pocket, she suspects the worst of Ike ruining their anniversary celebrations.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Caleb Hodgekiss comes up with a way to scam the residents of Walnut Grove after rescuing a seriously ill Rev Alden from his runaway wagon. Johnny Cash guest stars.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Nellie Oleson is seriously injured after falling from a horse that used to belong to Laura Ingalls, and her mother blames the steed's former owner for the accident.

programme.title: Providence

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd is forced to recall a repressed childhood memory of her late mother Lynda as she nurses a dying patient, and Joanie is jailed after impersonating her sister at a pharmaceuticals convention.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan helps a minister cope with a crisis of conscience when his church insists on religion being taught in pre-school classes - to the outrage of parents.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Mark is reunited with old friends at his high-school reunion, but they all find themselves forced to admit they are not as young as they used to be.

programme.title: Making Mr Right
programme.desc: A glamorous magazine editor makes a bet with her best friend that she can turn a scruffy conman into the perfect gentleman, who will win the title of her publication's bachelor of the year. But, as she sets about teaching the layabout some manners, she unexpectedly ends up falling for him and his laidback approach to life. Romantic comedy, starring Christina Cox, Dean Cain and Jocelyne Loewen.

programme.title: Sleeping with the Devil
programme.desc: A woman's life is turned upside down by the discovery that her seemingly perfect boyfriend is psychotically unbalanced and, as his mania increases, he pays a killer to gun her down. Drama, starring Shannen Doherty, Tim Matheson, Bonnie Bartlett and Steve Eastin.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy reads Adolf Hitler's book Mein Kampf, and causes uproar when he plans to publish excerpts in the newspaper so the townsfolk will be aware of what is happening in the world.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The church needs a new bell, creating tension between the Kennedys and the Olesons.

programme.title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Heartbroken Bride
programme.desc: The attorney is invited to the wedding of his niece, a famous popstar. During the wedding ceremony things are disrupted by the bride's uncle threatening her father. Security overpower him and take him into a side room, but later he is found dead - with the bride standing over him. Is she guilty or is she being framed? Mystery, starring Raymond Burr, Linda Blair, Ronny Cox, Barbara Hale and William R Moses.

programme.title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Lethal Lesson
programme.desc: The crusading attorney represents a law student wrongly accused of murder, hindered every step of the way by the defendant's wealthy girlfriend. Mystery, starring Raymond Burr, Barbara Hale, William R Moses and Alexandra Paul.

programme.title: Gettysburg
programme.desc: Fact-based drama recreating the battle of the American Civil War, where Union and Confederate forces fought for three days in Pennsylvania, a confrontation that would change the course of the war. Starring Tom Berenger, Martin Sheen, Jeff Daniels and Stephen Lang.

programme.title: Born Free
programme.desc: Oscar-winning fact-based drama chronicling the lives of game wardens Joy and George Adamson, who adopted an orphaned lion cub in Kenya and trained the animal to survive in the wild so that one day it might return to its natural habitat. Starring Virginia McKenna, Bill Travers and Geoffrey Keen.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven

programme.desc: A youngster is forced to go to live with his aunt on an isolated Canadian island following the death of his parents, and forms a bond with an orphaned wild pony - a relationship that helps him deal with his grief. Drama, starring Jane Seymour, Mark Rendall and James McGowan.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie

All the evidence seems to point in the direction of an old friend, and with a host of witnesses willing to testify against her, Perry has his work cut out. Mystery, featuring Raymond Burr in his last appearance as the ace attorney, with Barbara Hale, William R Moses and Stuart Damon.

programme.title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Maligned Mobster
programme.desc: A reformed hoodlum is charged with murdering his wife - but the crusading attorney steps in, hoping to prove his innocence. Crime drama, starring Raymond Burr, Michael Nader, Barbara Hale and William R Moses.

programme.title: Gettysburg
programme.desc: Fact-based drama recreating the battle of the American Civil War, where Union and Confederate forces fought for three days in Pennsylvania, a confrontation that would change the course of the war. Starring Tom Berenger, Martin Sheen, Jeff Daniels and Stephen Lang.

programme.title: Grace Kelly
programme.desc: Biopic of the Hollywood legend, beginning with her teenage years, examining her stormy relationship with her overbearing millionaire father, through to her success as a movie star and culminating in her marriage to Prince Rainier of Monaco, for whom she sacrificed her glittering career. Starring Cheryl Ladd, Lloyd Bridges, Diane Ladd and Alejandro Rey.

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark: Haven't We Met Before
programme.desc: A disturbed man causes concern when he claims he is responsible for a series of murders, and that he is the vengeance-hungry reincarnation of an executed 19th-century criminal. Thriller, adapted from a novel by Mary Higgins Clark, starring Nicolette Sheridan, Page Fletcher and Anthony Lemke.(n)

programme.title: This Child Is Mine
programme.desc: A couple adopt a baby girl, but the teenage mother fights a legal battle to regain custody of the child. Fact-based drama, starring Lindsay Wagner, Chris Sarandon and Nancy McKeon.(n)

programme.sub-title: The Lord Is My Shepherd - Part One
programme.desc: Part one of two. Jealous of Charles' attention for his new son, Laura longs for her father's affections and refuses to pray for her baby brother to get well when he falls ill.(n)

programme.title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Telltale Talk Show Host
programme.desc: An unpopular radio presenter is murdered and the finger points at a colleague - until Perry uncovers a host of famous suspects who had reason to do the dirty deed. Courtroom mystery, starring Raymond Burr, with TV personalities Montel Williams and Regis Philbin.(n)

programme.title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Jealous Jokester
programme.desc: Lawyer Bill McKenzie bends the rules to clear his niece of murdering a TV star who ruled her sitcom with an iron fist. Courtroom drama, starring Hal Holbrook, William R Moses, Barbara Hale and Tony Roberts, with an appearance by real-life sitcom star Tina Yothers.(n)

programme.title: Hercules
programme.desc: First of a two-part drama about the legendary son of Zeus. The Princess of Thebes falls pregnant by the chief of the gods. Once born, the child is made to feel an outcast as he is rejected by his mother, envied by brother Iphicles and the target of a revenge plot by Zeus's wife Hera. Forced into exile, Hercules agrees to a series of tasks to redeem himself. With Paul Telfer, Elizabeth Perkins, Timothy Dalton and Luke Ford.(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Husband
programme.desc: Fact-based thriller following the investigation into the disappearance of a pregnant woman. While her apparently devoted husband makes repeated appeals for her safe return, events take a shocking turn when a woman comes forward to reveal she is having an affair with him - and his public persona is just a facade. Starring Dean Cain, Sarah Brown and GW Bailey.(n)

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark: Loves Music, Loves to Dance
programme.desc: A tenacious TV producer sets out to get to the bottom of a friend's murder, certain that the killer was a man her pal had met online. However, it soon becomes clear that her very personal investigation has served only to place her in danger as well. Mystery, based on Mary Higgins Clark's novel, starring Patsy Kensit, Cynthia Preston and Dean McDermott.(n)

programme.title: Bad News
programme.desc: In the grip of his addictions, Patrick Melrose must fly to New York to collect his father’s ashes. Over the course of a lost Manhattan weekend, Patrick’s remorseless search for satisfaction, haunted by old acquaintances and insistent inner voices, sends him into a nightmarish spiral, including a disastrous date with the girl of his dreams. Alone in his hotel room later that night, he pushes body and mind to the very edge – desperate to stay one step ahead of his rapidly encroaching past. Limited series premiere.

programme.title: Never Mind
programme.desc: At the Melrose family’s glorious house in the South of France, young Patrick has the run of the magical grounds. His father David rules with cruelty and his mother Eleanor has retreated into self medication and booze. Bravely imaginative and self-sufficient out of necessity, 9-year-old Patrick encounters the volatile lives of adults with fear. They are expecting guests for the weekend, but this afternoon is profoundly unlike other summer days, and the shocking events that precede the guests’ arrival tear Patrick's world in two.

Amid a crowd of social dragonflies, Patrick searches for redemption and capacity for forgiveness, while confronting his past in a myriad of ways.

programme.title: Margin Call
programme.desc: Set in the high-stakes world of the ﬁnancial industry, this film follows the key players at an investment ﬁrm during a 24-hour period in the early stages of the 2008 ﬁnancial crisis. When an entry-level analyst unlocks information that could prove to be the downfall of the ﬁrm, a roller-coaster ride ensues as decisions both ﬁnancial and moral catapult the lives of all involved into mayhem.

programme.title: A Dog's Purpose
programme.desc: A devoted dog (voiced by Josh Gad) finds the meaning of his own existence through the lives of the humans he teaches to laugh and love. Also starring Dennis Quaid, Britt Robertson, K.J. Apa, Peggy Lipton and Pooch Hall.

programme.title: King Arthur
programme.desc: An adventure that tells the true story of Arthur (Clive Owen) and his bond of brotherhood with Lancelot (Ioan Gruffudd) and the Knights Of The Round Table as they fight for freedom and those they love. Co-starring Keira Knightley.

programme.title: Unbreakable
programme.desc: David Dunn (Bruce Willis) emerges from a horrific train crash without a single scratch on him. He meets a mysterious stranger (Samuel L. Jackson) whose obsession with David will change David's life forever.

programme.title: Sleepless
programme.desc: When Las Vegas cop Vincent Downs (Jamie Foxx) and his partner Sean (Tip "T.I." Harris) rob a cocaine shipment bound for a drug-dealing casino boss (Dermot Mulroney), the desperate businessman retaliates by kidnapping Vincent's son (Octavius J. Johnson). Pursued by a dogged Internal Affairs investigator (Michelle Monaghan) and a sadistic drug kingpin (Scoot McNairy), Vincent must rely on his street smarts and sheer force of will as he tries to rescue his child over the course of a single night. Directed by Baran bo Odar.

programme.title: Get The Gringo
programme.desc: An already bad day for Driver is not getting any better. He makes a big haul of millions that would give him a nice summer vacation on easy street, but it goes south - literally. During a high-speed car chase with the US Border Patrol and a bleeding body in his back seat, Driver flips his car smashing through the border wall, tumbling violently, coming to a stop in Mexico. Apprehended by the Mexican authorities, he is sent to a hard-core prison where he enters the strange and dangerous world of "El Pueblito". Starring Mel Gibson.

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
programme.desc: A woman emerges from a coma four years after taking a bullet to the head at her own wedding, and goes on an epic vendetta against her former boss and his deadly squad of international assassins in a kill or be-killed fight. Directed by Quentin Tarantino; stars Uma Thurman and Lucy Liu.

programme.title: Bipolar Rock 'N' Roller
programme.desc: A raw and unflinching account of Mauro Ranallo's decades-long struggle with Bipolar Affective Disorder. The voice of WWE and Showtime Championship Boxing, Ranallo has called some of the biggest sports events in history - all the while fighting his own epic battles with mental health. Follow his journey as he combats the stigma behind mental health issues and sheds light on what it's like being at the top of the industry despite seemingly insurmountable odds.

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Over-worked, over-committed and exhausted, Amy joins forces with two other stressed moms on a quest to liberate themselves from conventional responsibilities - going on a long overdue binge of freedom and fun that puts them on a collision course with the head of the PTA and her clique of perfect moms.

programme.title: Sleepwalking
programme.desc: Fiona taps deep into her Gallagher roots to get the homeless family out of her apartment and dismiss their lawsuit. An explosive incident sends Ian and some of his followers into hiding from the authorities. Meanwhile, Lip makes a difficult decision in order to have the life he really wants, Carl looks for a way to go back to school without upsetting Kassidi, Debbie considers letting Derek back into Franny's life and Frank makes plans to take advantage of Liam's rich friend. Season finale.(c)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
programme.desc: In this sequel to the Quentin Tarantino cult classic, a murderous bride continues her quest for vengeance against her former boss and lover and those who betrayed her, leading up to the ultimate confrontation with the man who ordered her execution. Stars Uma Thurman.

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: When a displaced Indian family opens a restaurant in the south of France, just 100 feet from a Michelin star restaurant, a culinary war ensues between the two establishments. Stars Academy Award® winner Helen Mirren.

programme.title: A Dog's Purpose
programme.desc: A devoted dog (voiced by Josh Gad) finds the meaning of his own existence through the lives of the humans he teaches to laugh and love. Also starring Dennis Quaid, Britt Robertson, K.J. Apa, Peggy Lipton and Pooch Hall.

programme.title: Crimson Tide
programme.desc: In the midst of a global crisis, the USS Alabama receives an unconfirmed order to launch its nuclear missiles - signaling the start of World War III. The tension quickly rises as the sub's respected commander (Gene Hackman) and his brilliant executive officer (Denzel Washington) clash over the validity of their orders, battling each other for control of the sub. Also starring Viggo Mortensen and James Gandolfini.

programme.title: Free State of Jones
programme.desc: A defiant Southern farmer, Newt Knight, leads an armed uprising of small farmers and local slaves that causes a county in Mississippi to secede from the Confederacy and create a free state in this epic action-drama set during the Civil War. Starring Oscar® winner Matthew McConaughey.

programme.title: Before I Fall
programme.desc: Sam (Zoey Deutch) seems to have everything a teenage girl could want: popularity, a hot boyfriend, cool status, fun friends, loving family and seeming happiness. But beyond the superficial, Sam's life isn't so charmed. She is one of a clique of high school mean girls who make life hell for those who are different. When Sam is killed in a car accident, she is forced to relive her last day on Earth seven times in order to get things right. She attempts to make sense of what befell her and gain a better understanding of herself and others.

programme.title: The Sense of an Ending
programme.desc: Tony Webster (Jim Broadbent) lives a reclusive existence in London, until he learns that a diary has been left to him by the recently deceased mother (Emily Mortimer) of an ex-girlfriend (Charlotte Rampling). As Webster investigates the diary, he is forced to face the truth about his first love and the consequences of decisions made a lifetime ago, while attempting to resolve his strained relationships with his ex-wife (Harriet Walter) and their pregnant daughter (Michelle Dockery).

programme.title: Rebel in the Rye
programme.desc: Set amidst the colorful backdrop of mid-20th century New York City, this film follows a young J.D. Salinger (Nicholas Hoult) as he struggles to find his voice, pursues a love affair with famed socialite Oona O'Neill (Zoey Deutch) and fights on the frontlines of World War II. It's these experiences that inform the creation of his masterpiece, The Catcher in the Rye, bringing him overnight fame (and notoriety) and leading him to withdraw from the public eye for the rest of his life.

programme.title: Crimson Tide
programme.desc: In the midst of a global crisis, the USS Alabama receives an unconfirmed order to launch its nuclear missiles - signaling the start of World War III. The tension quickly rises as the sub's respected commander (Gene Hackman) and his brilliant executive officer (Denzel Washington) clash over the validity of their orders, battling each other for control of the sub. Also starring Viggo Mortensen and James Gandolfini.(n)

In this fiercely competitive environment, The Times and The Washington Post vie for scoops while overtaxed journalists work to develop sources inside a volatile administration. Meanwhile, the paper faces economic challenges as it continues to adapt to a digital world.(n)

programme.title: Single White Female
programme.desc: Hedy (Jennifer Jason Leigh) appears at the apartment of Allie (Bridget Fonda) just as she has thrown out her unfaithful boyfriend (Steven Weber). The surviving half of a set of twins, Hedy perpetually seeks someone to complete her, and sees in Allie everything she would like to be. Hedy moves not only into the apartment, but into the most personal aspects of Allie's life, including having her hair styled exactly to match her roommate's. When Allie reconciles with her boyfriend, the unspoken bargain between the women goes terrifyingly awry.(n)

programme.title: Single White Female 2: The Psycho
programme.desc: When Holly Parker (Kristen Miller) moves into her new apartment, she thinks she has found the perfect roommate: Tess Kositch (Allison Lange), a sweet and shy young woman who wants to be her friend. But underneath Tess' shy exterior lies a killer who believes there is nothing sweeter in life than murdering a friend in pain. And Holly is feeling a lot of pain lately, what with her boyfriend cheating on her and her co-worker undermining any chance she has for promotion. But Holly need not worry, Tess will take care of her.(n)

programme.title: Best in Sex: 2018 AVN Awards
programme.desc: The AVN awards celebrate outstanding achievements in the world of adult entertainment. Awards are given out in categories like Best New Starlet, Most Outrageous Sex Scene, Best Group Sex Scene and Most Spectacular Boobs.(n)

programme.title: The Good Shepherd
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Robert De Niro directs this story of a young CIA agent during the Cold War whose dedication to work costs him his innocence and his soul. Academy Award winners Matt Damon and Angelina Jolie also star.(n)

programme.title: The Preacher's Wife
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars as an angel named Dudley sent to Earth to help a minister's marriage (Courtney B. Vance) to his wife (Whitney Houston). Things take a twist when Dudley accidentally falls in love with her.(n)

Diagnosed with spinal cancer, 27 year old Adam (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) navigates the road to recovery with the sometimes-overbearing support of his crude best friend, Kyle (Seth Rogen), his smothering mother (Anjelica Huston) and an inexperienced therapist (Anna Kendrick). Inspired by a true story, 50/50 is an honest yet hysterically funny account of a young man's journey toward healing.(n)

programme.title: Shanghai Noon
programme.desc: The Wild West meets the Far East in a battle for honor, royalty and gold when acrobatic Chinese Imperial Guard Chon Wang (Jackie Chan) comes to America to rescue beautiful Princess Pei Pei (Lucy Liu) who has been kidnapped from The Forbidden City. With the help of a partner he doesn't trust (Owen Wilson), a wife he didn't expect (Brandon Merrill), a horse with a personality all its own and martial arts moves no one can believe, Chon finds himself facing the meanest gunslingers in the West.(n)

programme.title: The Gunman
programme.desc: Sean Penn stars as Jim Terrier, an ex-special forces government contractor who is betrayed by the organization he once worked for and must go on the run in a relentless game of cat and mouse across Africa and Europe.(n)

programme.title: Man On A Ledge
programme.desc: When former NYPD officer turned prison escapee Nick Cassidy (Sam Worthington) enters the famed Roosevelt Hotel on 45th and Madison in New York City, heads to one of the highest floors and steps out a window onto the ledge, he threatens more than just his own well-being. A whole city is about to seize up, including some very nervous people with some very big secrets. Elizabeth Banks, Ed Harris and Edward Burns co-star in this propulsive, twisty action thriller.(n)

programme.title: Robocop
programme.desc: When an honest cop (Peter Weller) is killed in the line of duty, the embattled Detroit Police Department of the future brings him back to life as RoboCop, the latest in cyborg technology. Programmed to be the ultimate law enforcer, RoboCop's not supposed to remember his human past - but memories of life, love and family are flooding in, blurring the line between man and machine, even as RoboCop sweeps the streets of "scum." Nancy Allen, Kurtwood Smith and Ronny Cox costar in this sci-fi blockbuster.(n)

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.desc: In the near future, Major (Scarlett Johansson) is the first of her kind - a human saved from a terrible crash, who is cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals. Terrorism has reached a new level that includes the ability to hack into people's minds and control them, but Major is uniquely qualified to stop it. As she prepares to face a new enemy, Major discovers that she has been lied to: her life was not saved, it was stolen. Now she must figure out who created her.(n)

programme.title: Robocop
programme.desc: When an honest cop (Peter Weller) is killed in the line of duty, the embattled Detroit Police Department of the future brings him back to life as RoboCop, the latest in cyborg technology. Programmed to be the ultimate law enforcer, RoboCop's not supposed to remember his human past - but memories of life, love and family are flooding in, blurring the line between man and machine, even as RoboCop sweeps the streets of "scum." Nancy Allen, Kurtwood Smith and Ronny Cox costar in this sci-fi blockbuster.

programme.title: Push (2009)
programme.desc: A clairvoyant teenager (Dakota Fanning) and a telekinetic fugitive (Chris Evans) team up to find a missing woman who is the key to exposing a sinister, secret government agency that's building a clandestine army of psychic warriors. Djimon Hounsou costars in this sci-fi action thriller.

programme.title: The Hills Have Eyes
programme.desc: Directed by Wes Craven, this cult horror classic is the tale of an all-American family on a road trip to California when their car breaks down in the remote southwestern desert, and they encounter a clan of marauding, inbred cannibals. In this primal wasteland, will the innocent turn savage to survive?

programme.title: Personal Shopper
programme.desc: By day, American in Paris Maureen (Kristen Stewart) works as a personal shopper, motor-biking around the city buying up deluxe couture for a celebrity client. By night, she attempts to channel the spirits of the dead, hoping to make contact with her recently deceased twin brother. When Maureen begins receiving a series of chilling, increasingly sinister text messages, it seems she may have made contact - but she doesn't know with whom.

programme.title: Don't Knock Twice
programme.desc: A successful sculptor named Jess returns to the UK to rebuild her relationship with Chloe, the daughter she was forced to give up nine years ago. When she agrees to come and live with her, Jess learns that Chloe has not come to stay because she wants to get to know her mother again. She has come because she is scared that a supernatural curse has claimed the life of her boyfriend, Danny, and is now coming for her. Chloe and Danny made the mistake of visiting an abandoned house once home to a witch, that comes for you if you knock on the door.

programme.title: Dune
programme.desc: On distant planets, a royal messiah has been born who will restore order to the universe, but there are forces that don't want evil to be vanquished!

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world.

programme.title: Wristcutters: A Love Story (2006)
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, a young man decides to end it all, only to discover a run-down afterlife that is strikingly similar to his old one. When he discovers his ex-girlfriend is there too, he sets out on an absurd road trip through purgatory to find her.

programme.title: Dudes & Dragons
programme.desc: When a powerful wizard is jilted by a princess, he vows to rid the land of love and commands a fire breathing dragon to destroy any sign of affection seen throughout the kingdom but as the death toll rises, a brave and arrogant warrior and his estranged brother answer the princess’ call to fight the curse.

programme.title: The Pact
programme.desc: Nicole and Annie reluctantly return to their childhood home to pay their respects after their mother passes away. While staying overnight in the house, the sisters sense a mysterious presence in their midst - noises startling them in the night, objects moving about, a fallen picture of an unknown woman posed next to their mother. Annie begins experiencing a series of intense & disturbing dreams, and ­visions that lead to her mother's past finally revealing itself.

programme.title: Lady Psycho Killer
programme.desc: A knife-wielding killer is on the loose in a small town slicing and dicing men of questionable intent. As her brutality leaves the town littered with corpses, her bloodlust is lost on her young lover who pursues her anyway.

programme.title: It Stains The Sands Red
programme.desc: In the throes of a zombie apocalypse, Molly - a troubled woman from Las Vegas with a dark past - finds herself stranded in the desert with a ravenous zombie on her tail. At first, she's easily able to outpace her undead pursuer, but things quickly become worse when she realizes the zombie doesn't need to ever stop and rest. Running low on supplies and beat down by the harsh environment, Molly must summon strength she never knew she had in order to face it.

programme.title: Reeker
programme.desc: A group of disparate strangers including a blind genius and a druggie who ripped off his ecstasy dealer converges on a small, abandoned town where they are promptly slaughtered one at a time by a grotesque and extremely foul-smelling creature. Devon Gummersall, Derek Richardson and Tina Illman star in this tongue-in-cheek horror flick.

programme.title: Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: An engaged couple goes away with their friends to a remote cabin to celebrate their upcoming wedding but the weekend takes a horrifying turn when dark secrets and forbidden desires are revealed and what started as a celebration quickly descends into a bloody nightmare.

programme.title: Lady Psycho Killer
programme.desc: A knife-wielding killer is on the loose in a small town slicing and dicing men of questionable intent. As her brutality leaves the town littered with corpses, her bloodlust is lost on her young lover who pursues her anyway.

programme.title: It Stains The Sands Red
programme.desc: In the throes of a zombie apocalypse, Molly - a troubled woman from Las Vegas with a dark past - finds herself stranded in the desert with a ravenous zombie on her tail. At first, she's easily able to outpace her undead pursuer, but things quickly become worse when she realizes the zombie doesn't need to ever stop and rest. Running low on supplies and beat down by the harsh environment, Molly must summon strength she never knew she had in order to face it.

programme.title: Zombie Honeymoon
programme.desc: When a beach-front encounter with a zombie during their honeymoon results in a groom with a taste for human flesh, a newlywed bride tries to make the best of a rapidly deteriorating situation in this romantic horror comedy starring Tracy Coogan and Graham Sibley.

programme.title: I Survived a Zombie Holocaust
programme.desc: Fresh from film school, an enthusiastic young runner starts work on a low budget zombie movie only to run into the first day from hell as a mystery illness starts to turn the extras on set into the bona fide undead.

programme.title: Stake Land
programme.desc: When an epidemic of vampirism strikes and his family is slaughtered, young Martin (Connor Paolo) is taken under the wing of a grizzled, wayward hunter (Nick Damici) whose new prey are the undead. Simply known as Mister, the vampire stalker takes Martin on a journey through the locked-down towns of America's heartland, searching for a better place to call home while taking down any bloodsuckers that cross their path.

programme.title: Nocturne
programme.desc: Isaac intends to throw the greatest graduation party of all time while his parents are out of town. Instead, he is disappointed to find that only a handful of his friends show up. Intent on making the best of the night, the group performs a séance to learn more about the futures that lie before them. The seemingly innocent game goes terribly wrong and they soon find that they are not alone in the house. Something has joined the party, and it wants them dead.

programme.title: Wristcutters: A Love Story (2006)
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, a young man decides to end it all, only to discover a run-down afterlife that is strikingly similar to his old one. When he discovers his ex-girlfriend is there too, he sets out on an absurd road trip through purgatory to find her.

programme.title: Cold Souls
programme.desc: Paul Giamatti stars in this surreal comedy as an actor paralyzed by anxiety who decides to have his soul extracted by a high-tech company in order to alleviate his suffering but complications ensue when a mysterious soul-trafficking mule steals his soul and takes it to Russia.

programme.title: Devil's Pass
programme.desc: Nine Russian hikers venture into a remote area of the Ural Mountains. Two weeks later, all nine are found dead. Five ambitious American college students are issued a grant to return to the site of the original events in the belief that they can uncover and document the truth of what happened. Their trek through the mountains, retracing the steps of that ill-fated journey, is plagued by strange and increasingly terrifying phenomena, all of which suggest that they are not alone. The forces behind the Dyatlov Pass Incident are waiting for them.

programme.title: Cursed to Kill
programme.desc: Rachel awakens in a hospital, paralyzed from the waist down after a failed attempt on her life for abandoning a cult suicide. Her suffering grows as the spirits of the deceased members begin to haunt her within the confines of the hospital room. They threaten to kill her unless she is willing to offer up a kindred soul in place of her own - her brother's child. But the week that Rachel is given to make her decision is tethered to a curse. All who have the misfortune of hearing anything she says are met with a swift and violent death.

programme.title: Refuge
programme.desc: Post-apocalyptic thriller set in the ruins of a collapsed America where a family struggles to survive and rebuild a life in the wake of a catastrophic plague that has wiped out most of the surrounding civilization. When they take in an injured young man, it may threaten everything they have.

programme.title: Bang Bang Baby
programme.desc: In this dreamy sci-fi musical set in the 1960s, an isolated small town teenager believes her hopes of becoming a famous singer will come true when her rock star idol gets stranded in town and romance blooms between them but a leak in a nearby chemical plant threatens to turn her dream into a nightmare.

programme.title: Amigo Undead
programme.desc: In this comic horror movie, two estranged brothers reunite at a birthday party in the woods but when the partygoers awaken an ancient demonic force, the brothers must find a way to put aside their differences in order to escape.

programme.title: Skybound
programme.desc: Five plane passengers are unable to land after a gigantic disaster happens on the ground.

programme.title: Cell
programme.desc: At the Boston airport, Clay (John Cusack) witnesses a scene of chaotic mayhem when an electronic signal turns hundreds of cell phone users into rabid killers. Desperate to find his estranged wife and son, Clay teams with a train driver (Samuel L. Jackson) to battle the horde of murderous phoners as the city descends into madness.

programme.title: Don't Sleep
programme.desc: Shawn and Zach are young lovers who move into a guesthouse together on an estate owned by Mr. and Mrs. Marino. When bizarre events begin to occur, Zach slowly remembers a forgotten time in his childhood when he suffered from severe and violent psychosis - memories erased by a series of electroconvulsive shock treatments administered by his psychiatrist. As the terrors surrounding their lives grow to deadly proportions, Zach is forced to question his own sanity.

programme.title: The Collector
programme.desc: An ex-convict who is desperate to pay off his debts schemes to rob his wealthy employer's home, unaware that the place is rigged with a series of fiendishly deadly traps. Josh Stewart, Michael Reilly Burke and Andrea Roth star in this clever horror thriller.(n)

programme.title: Intruders
programme.desc: An agoraphobic woman is isolated from human contact in every way and that is exactly how she likes it. But when a trio of criminals breaks into her old Victorian house on the outskirts of town, they discover there's another side to her psychosis.(n)

programme.title: Dude Bro Party Massacre III
programme.desc: Brent enters the halls of the Delta Bi Theta fraternity. He isn't just any pledge, he's a legacy - and it's a legacy of death. Brent is actually there to solve the mystery of his identical twin brother Brock's murder, and he'll do anything to crack the case, including an attempt at the frat's most daring prank of all time. After the prank causes two commercial jets to collide over an orphanage, they're punished to a weekend at The Old Sorority House by the Lake. But they're not the only ones there, a killer named Motherface lurks nearby.(n)

programme.title: The Autopsy of Jane Doe
programme.desc: Coroner Tommy Tilden and son Austin run a morgue and crematorium in Virginia. When the local sheriff brings in a body found in the basement of a home, it seems like just another open-and-shut case. As the autopsy proceeds however, they are left reeling as the inspection brings new revelations. Perfectly preserved on the outside, Jane Doe seems to have been the victim of a horrific ritualistic torture. Tommy and Austin begin to piece together these gruesome discoveries, as an unnatural force takes hold of the crematorium.(n)

programme.title: Pet
programme.desc: Psychological thriller about a lonely man who bumps into an old crush and subsequently becomes obsessed with her, leading him to hold her captive underneath the animal shelter where he works. But she is not who she seems to be - and his reason to lock her up may not be as crazy as originally thought.(n)

programme.title: Rabid
programme.desc: After a young woman has a motorcycle accident that leads to experimental surgery to save her life, she develops a taste for blood that spurs a city-wide zombie epidemic.(n)

programme.title: Jurassic School
programme.desc: Nerdy middle schooler Tommy is forced take care of a baby dinosaur after his cloned science fair project hatches early. He quickly begins to think of the creature not only as a pet, but also as a friend. But when the dinosaur escapes on the day of the fair, Tommy must figure out a way to get the creature back before greedy grown-ups get to him first.(n)

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Teenager Max McGrath moves back to Copper Canyon, the town where his scientist father died under mysterious circumstances. Adjusting to a new school is not easy for Max, and it becomes even more complicated when his body starts to generate strange energy flare-ups that he can't control. This unpredictable power surge grows too intense for Max to handle and he is forced to distance himself from those around him. On the brink of fatal combustion, Max is rescued by Steel, an extraterrestrial who has been secretly monitoring his progress.(n)

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: Tom Cruise delivers one of his finest performances in this unforgettable film that reunites him with Cameron Crowe, the director of "Jerry Maguire." The charmed life of young, handsome and wealthy publishing tycoon David Aames (Cruise) seems somehow incomplete until he meets the woman of his dreams (Penelope Cruz). But a fateful encounter with a jealous lover (Cameron Diaz) sends David's world out of control, rocketing him on a rollercoaster ride of romance, sex, suspicion and dreams...leading to a shocking, final awakening.(n)

programme.title: Push (2009)
programme.desc: A clairvoyant teenager (Dakota Fanning) and a telekinetic fugitive (Chris Evans) team up to find a missing woman who is the key to exposing a sinister, secret government agency that's building a clandestine army of psychic warriors. Djimon Hounsou costars in this sci-fi action thriller.(n)

programme.title: The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus
programme.desc: Doctor Parnassus (Christopher Plummer) is cursed with a dark secret. Thousands of years ago he made a bet with the devil, Mr. Nick (Tom Waits), in which he won immortality. Centuries later, on meeting his one true love, Dr. Parnassus made another deal with the devil, trading his immortality for youth, on condition that when his daughter reaches her 16th birthday, she will become the property of Mr. Nick. His daughter is now rapidly approaching the age milestone and Dr. Parnassus is desperate to protect her from her impending fate.(n)

programme.title: ATM
programme.desc: After leaving a party together, coworkers David (Brian Geraghty), Emily (Alice Eve) and Corey (Josh Peck) stop at an ATM. Pulling into a desolate parking lot, Corey gets out to get cash and a routine transaction turns into a struggle for survival when an unknown man appears outside blocking their exit. With the wintry temperatures dipping below freezing, and the morning sunrise still hours away, they have no choice but to play the man's deadly game of cat-and-mouse.(n)

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: Tom Cruise delivers one of his finest performances in this unforgettable film that reunites him with Cameron Crowe, the director of "Jerry Maguire." The charmed life of young, handsome and wealthy publishing tycoon David Aames (Cruise) seems somehow incomplete until he meets the woman of his dreams (Penelope Cruz). But a fateful encounter with a jealous lover (Cameron Diaz) sends David's world out of control, rocketing him on a rollercoaster ride of romance, sex, suspicion and dreams...leading to a shocking, final awakening.(n)

programme.title: Rolling Stones: Sweet Summer Sun - Hyde Park Live
programme.desc: The biggest live show of the year: The Rolling Stones return to Hyde Park, London almost 44 years to the day after their legendary free concert in July 1969. Featuring their greatest hits across a career spanning 50 years, plus a special appearance by former Stones guitarist Mick Taylor. Highlights include 'Gimme Shelter,' 'Jumpin' Jack Flash,' 'You Can't Always Get What You Want' and '(I Can't Get No) Satisfaction.'.

programme.title: Black Sabbath - The End of The End
programme.desc: Chronicles the final tour from Black Sabbath. On February 4th, 2017, Black Sabbath takes the stage in Birmingham, the city where it all began, to play the 81st and final gig of the tour and bring down the curtain on a career that spanned almost half a century. The cameras are taken into the heart of the action, getting up close and personal with the band as they perform genre-defining hits, from 'Iron Man' to 'Paranoid' to 'War Pigs', among others. The special also features a studio performance of some of their songs not played on the tour.

programme.title: Tim & Faith: Soul2Soul
programme.desc: Includes live performances from Tim McGraw and Faith Hill's 2017 Soul2Soul world tour, as well as an intimate look inside their relationship.
